original_text: The women who had come with him from Galilee followed and saw the tomb and how his body was laid.
korean_text: 갈릴리에서 예수와 함께 온 여자들이 뒤를 따라 그 무덤과 그의 시체를 어떻게 두었는지를 보고

sentences.original_text: The women who had come with him from Galilee
and how his body was laid.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 몸이 어떻게 누워 있는지도 보았습니다
